DOC.brief_summary: The investigator aim study potential racial difference renal phosphorus handle provocatively test urinary phosphorus excretion use parathyroid hormone infusion healthy white volunteer compare healthy black volunteer .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Body mass index ( BMI ) within 20 % ideal age gender Abnormal urinalysis Pregnancy breastfeed Medical condition impact phosphorus metabolism—primary hyperparathyroidism ; diabetes mellitus ; gastrointestinal malabsorption disorder ; hyper hypothyroidism Medications know affect phosphorus metabolism— current use phosphorus supplement , phosphorus binder , calcitriol calcitriol analogue , regular antacid laxative use , calcitonin , etidronate , anticonvulsant Hyper hypophosphatemia ( ≥ 4.6 mg/dl ≤ 2.5 mg/dl respectively ) , hyper hypocalcemia ( ≥ 10.6 ≤ 8.5 mg/dl respectively ) , severe anemia ( Hgb < 8 g/dl woman < 9 g/dl men )
